TopicTitle: The Official HypeTrain 0.90 Voyage Thread (Experimentals! Choo Choo Dangit!)

Articles.Content:
Sweet! I knew living in the Hype Train for the past 2 months would pay off eventually!

Huh. I wondered who that corpse was. I guess it wasn't a corpse after all. Just a sleeping person.

Seriously, did I see a MK2 to 2.5 meter rocket tank adapter in that album?

I think so... That or I misinterpreted the part.

Also, Gregrox, I don't need a ticket if I work as the coal-loader, right?

Ah, your train replica. Pretty neat, but not accurate. the 0.24 HypeTrain (and 0.25) was a Black Five locomotive.

Now it's a Gresley A3.

It is not a replica. Just my own creation. I even didn't saw the Hype Train threads here on the forum when I made the video.
All aboard the HypePlane!
CHOO CHOO! I was here for the 0.25 hype train, but I didn't have an account at the time. I am looking foward to many hype relate shenanigans. Also, one ticket for first class in the hype plane.

Ladder-Climbing - Kerbals can now climb over ledges between ladders Astronaut Mobility Enhancers. This means no more bobbing up and down trying to get up the ladder.

EVA Restrictions - No longer can you skip large parts of the tech tree by sciencing on the various buildings around KSC. You can't get out of your capsule until you've researched enough tech to unlock EVA suits.

Wait wait wait... what? I must've missed something...
Im betting on a December 23 for the release

All aboard the HypePlane!

Either those are JATO's or it's going to be a bad day.
-removed because dang this was just waaaay too stupid-
Climbing aboard the hype train again. Can't wait for 0.90!
CHOO CHOOOOOOOO! ROAR!

Climbing aboard the hype train again. Can't wait for 0.90!

Good to hear! HYPE!

- - - Updated - - -

CHOO CHOOOOOOOO! ROAR!

http://i.imgur.com/jbKacK0.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/rdfurjK.png

http://i.imgur.com/ogU7Ay4.png

Now make a replica of the actual HypeTrain. (A Gresley A3)

But seriously, that's pretty cool.
I have hopped aboard the HypeTrain, and am really hyped up!
You forgot me, You need the Coal for the train.

You forgot me, You need the Coal for the train.

Correction Hype-coal totally different from coal ,but other than that someone should forge a cast iron version of jeb ,and send it to Squad HQ as a gift for reaching .90 when it comes comes out.
I know It's hypecoal.

I know It's hypecoal.

HypeCoal is actually generated by the community's poop sheer hype.
But is Jeremy Clarkson stoking the Hype Train?

I'm boarded on the Hypetrain, We need the personell from 0.25!

Megatiger! Where are you?!

I haven't been on the forums for a while... So much has changed.

Actually, not that much has changed...

Anyway, I guess it's time for me to crank up my HypeTrain playlist again... This time, even Beta Den Eva'... I need suggestions for songs, though.
This definitely:
Ah, it feels good to be back aboard.
Is it just me, or is the dev cycle over at Squad starting to sound like a well-oiled machine? I can't believe how fast Experimentals happened for such a big patch!

Is it just me, or is the dev cycle over at Squad starting to sound like a well-oiled machine? I can't believe how fast Experimentals happened for such a big patch!

It's not just you, I've been playing since late .22, and since the pretty botched roll out of .23.5, they've gotten a lot better.

This time around at least the intended deadline seems obvious... Christmas being three weeks away and all. Though regardless of when it arrives, I'll be happy.

Only problem is I can't decide which of the new features I'm more excited to try out first! Flying the new Mk3 parts, blowing up the new buildings, trying the new contracts, training new pilots, exploring new biomes...? It all looks so cool.
